translations.english_saheeh: When the victory of Allāh has come and the conquest,[2005]
translations.english_hilali_khan: 1. When there comes the Help of Allâh (to you, O Muhammad صلى الله عليه وسلم against your enemies) and the conquest (of Makkah).
translations.english_rwwad: When there comes Allah’s help and the conquest,

arabic_text: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا
phonetic: 110.2 Wa Ra'ayta An-Nāsa Yadkhulūna Fī Dīni Allāhi 'Afwājāan

translations.english_saheeh: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allāh in multitudes,
translations.english_hilali_khan: And you see that the people enter Allah’s religion (Islâm) in crowds.
translations.english_rwwad: and you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,

arabic_text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
phonetic: 110.3 Fasabbiĥ Biĥamdi Rabbika Wa Astaghfirhu 'Innahu Kāna Tawwābāan

translations.english_saheeh: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.[2006]
translations.english_hilali_khan: So glorify the Praises of your Lord, and ask His Forgiveness. Verily, He is the One Who accepts the repentance and Who forgives.
translations.english_rwwad: then glorify the praise of your Lord, and ask His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
